0.dialouge: You're right on time young lads!

1.dialouge: You better be ready, I'm about to work all of you to the bone.

2.dialouge: Unfortunately,~ Before we begin, I'm legally obligated to read aloud these instructions before we begin.

3.dialouge: Dear students, welcome to SkyLine Inc, where we are dedicated to empowering the world in a safe and friendly way.

4.dialouge: Here at SkyLine Inc, we hire Navigators to collect pieces of the sky (also known as shards) which are used to provide power all across the pillar.

5.dialouge: We are pround to provide power to two dozen corporations and private entities and are currently expanding out horizons.

6.dialouge: Today students, we welcome you to step up and experience this life for your self.

7.dialouge: Please note that students are under no circumstances allowed to:~ 1. keep any shard for oneself~ 2. wander of these premises~ and 3. collect shards from undesignated areas.

8.dialouge: Violation of any of these rules may result in immediate termination of the selection for the student and thier partner.

9.dialouge: Why don't you two try to collect, say... five shards today.

10.dialouge: Of course you two can always collect more. I'm sure the examiners would like that!

11.dialouge: Now, unless you have any questions, you better be on your way.

12.dialouge: Show us what you can do!
